dataIdInfo.idAbs: This script runs topo to raster as a prelimary burning and walling process before HydroDEM is run. It takes a buffered DEM dataset and runs raster to multipoint with VIP filtering based on the percentage set in the tool. The output of the script is a new DEM to be used by HydroDEM.

tool.name: TopoGrid

param.name: Workspace
param.dialogReference: Geodatabase type workspace to read and write files to.

param.name: huc8
param.dialogReference: Local processing unit boundary to confine the output DEM interpolation.

param.name: buffdist
param.dialogReference: Distance to buffer huc8 in horizontal map units. This buffer is used to inform the topography at the periphery of the processing domain. Larger values will take longer to process.

param.name: huc12
param.displayname: 12 Digit Hydrologic Unit Datasets if dissolved HUC8 boundary failed.
param.dialogReference: Multivalue parameter of local processing domain sub-units.

param.name: dendrite
param.dialogReference: Flowline dendrite feature class or shapefile to constrain DEM interpolation.

param.name: dem
param.dialogReference: Original DEM to turn into a point cloud using VIP point filtering.

param.name: cellSize
param.dialogReference: Output cell size in horizontal map units.

param.name: vipPer
param.dialogReference: VIP thinning parameter. This is the percentile of points to keep. See additional documentation for the arcpy.TopoToRaster_3d function.

param.name: snapgrid
param.dialogReference: Grid used to align the results of this tool. The origin of this grid should be divisible by 1.

tool.summary:
This script runs topo to raster as a preliminary burning and walling process before HydroDEM is run. It takes a buffered DEM dataset and runs raster to multipoint with VIP filtering based on the percentage set in the tool. The output of the script is a new DEM to be used by HydroDEM.

Complete documentation can be found at XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX.
